member.name: CD3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_VIEW_DESC.CD3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_VIEW_DESC
member.summary: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_VIEW_DESC structure that is initialized with a structure.
member.param: Address of the structure that initializes the CD3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_VIEW_DESC structure.

member.name: CD3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_VIEW_DESC.CD3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_VIEW_DESC
member.summary: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_VIEW_DESC structure that is initialized with values.
member.param: A -typed value that specifies the depth-stencil type of the view.
A -typed value that specifies the viewing format.
The index of the mipmap level to use mip slice.
The index of the first element to use in an array of elements.
Number of elements in the array.
A value that describes whether the texture is read only. Pass 0 to specify that it is not read only; otherwise, pass one of the members of the enumerated type.

member.name: CD3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_VIEW_DESC.CD3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_VIEW_DESC
member.summary: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_VIEW_DESC structure that is initialized with D3D11_TEX1D_DSV or D3D11_TEX1D_ARRAY_DSV values.
member.param: A pointer to a ID3D11Texture1D interface for a 1D texture.
A D3D11_DSV_DIMENSION-typed value that specifies the depth-stencil type of the view.
A DXGI_FORMAT-typed value that specifies the viewing format.
The index of the mipmap level to use mip slice.
The index of the first element to use in an array of elements.
Number of elements in the array.
A value that describes whether the texture is read only. Pass 0 to specify that it is not read only; otherwise, pass one of the members of the D3D11_DSV_FLAG enumerated type.

member.name: CD3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_VIEW_DESC.CD3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_VIEW_DESC
member.summary: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_VIEW_DESC structure that is initialized with 2D texture values.
member.param: A pointer to a ID3D11Texture2D.
A D3D11_DSV_DIMENSION-typed value that specifies the depth-stencil type of the view.
A DXGI_FORMAT-typed value that specifies the viewing format.
The index of the mipmap level to use mip slice.
The index of the first element to use in an array of elements.
Number of elements in the array.
A value that describes whether the texture is read only. Pass 0 to specify that it is not read only; otherwise, pass one of the members of the D3D11_DSV_FLAG enumerated type.

member.name: CD3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_VIEW_DESC.CD3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_VIEW_DESC
member.summary: Instantiates a new instance of an uninitialized CD3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_VIEW_DESC structure.

member.name: CD3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_VIEW_DESC
member.summary: Represents a depth-stencil view and provides convenience methods for creating depth-stencil views.
